nodes.text: The Pelgrin sector was a sector located within the Outer Rim Territories region of the galaxy. Its trailing boundary bordered the Tolonda sector, and, moving clockwise, it also bordered the Dalchon and Gaulus sectors. The area within the sector was considered well-explored by 25 BBY, and in 25 ABY the average population of a star system in the sector was less than one million. It contained the Rordak system, which contained Rordak, the desolate and mountainous homeworld of the sentient Viska species.
